 Promotion for enterprise customer in 10/2013 (Not including cellphone) 1. Eligibility: New activate post paid subscribers which are under named by enterprise or Organization. New activate post paid subscribers which are under named by Personal Customer who is staff of Enterprise or Organization (must be confirmed by company) Not applicable for: Professional, assigned, tested subscribers, internal customer’s subscribers and subscribers connect VIE code Center 2 : must has Billing Payment Address at Center 2. Promotion time: 2/10 - 31/10/2013 2. Content: 2.1 . Tariff plan and benefits: Eligible subscriber can register 1 in 5 following plans: DN45, DN70, DN145, DN170, GM9000 Time for enjoying benefits: until 31/10/2014 Activation fee : VND 60.000 Plan Price (including monthly fee) Benefits Voice call Data DN45 94.000 Free first 1 0 minutes , maximum 1.500 minutes / cycle - MobiFone. - Fixed VNPT number (included Gphone) of Province/City where subscriber register activation None DN70 119.000 Free 1 MIU/ cycle, within 12 cycles DN145 194.000 - MobiFone. - VinaPhone - Fixed VNPT number (included Gphone) in all over the country. None DN170 219.000 Free 1 MIU/ cycle, within 12 cycles GM9000 150.000 Free 300 minutes/ cycle (not limit first 10 minutes) - Local call (on-net call, off-net call, voice call..) Free 1 MIU/ cycle, within 2 cycles 2.2. Notes: Do not allow to update plan Plan's price: including VND 49.000 monthly fee (VAT included) Applied for current rounding rule. Applied for peak and off-peak hour . All benefits are applied for 1 cycle only, the left minutes will be canceled (cannot cumulate for the next period).. After minutes allowance, customer will be charged at current rate charges.. Do not allow joining other promotions. If subscriber can join other promotions (as regulations), subscriber will enjoy the promotion which has highest benefit and follow regulation of that promotion When subscribers, which are blocked incoming and outgoing calls and joining promotion, re-activate, they are still allow joining promotion as regulation Time for enjoying benefits: o Voice call : depend on each program (depend on the time registers to join promotion) o Data: &#167; DN70 & DN 170 : within 12 cycles &#167; GM 9000 : within 2 cycles 2.3. Data's notes: Data plan is activated automatically (No need to register). When checking temporary bill, there will have the plan cost (VND 50 000) but at the end of billing cycle, the plan cost will be deducted. Follow current regulation of MIU plan (block 1 - 2ways communications, low-speed..) &#183; Be automatically re-newed and receive announcement SMS after renewing successfully &#183; To billing cycles that have expire date is 31 days and have 2 free MIU plan in 1 billing cycles (plan is renew automatically byu the system), will get both 2 plans &#183; If customer register new MI plan (N period), the promotion data will be canceled at the time register MI plan (customer still has to pay plan's price as regulation). In order to use benefit of data promotion next period (N+1 period), customer must cancel MI plan and re-register MIU plan. Customer should re-register in N+1 Period &#183; In case of canceling MIU (register new MI plan, be blocked 2 ways communication…) to continue getting data benefits in next periods (N+1 period), customer must re-register MIU plan 2.4. Regulation of cancellation Syntax: HUY_DN send to 999 (200đ) - then send Y to confirm If canceling the promotion, the promotion plan will be canceled immediately since canceling successfully. In case of not joining promotion Switch to other subscriber types. Cancel/Stop using postpaid.. Transferring ownership.. Do not want to continue joining this program. At the cycle customer stop joining, customer must pay joining fee as using days IF customers cancel joining the promotion, they are not allowed to re-register 3. DN45, DN70, DN145, DN170, GM9000 &#65289;&#12398; 1 &#12497;&#12483;&#12465;&#12540;&#12472;&#12434;&#30331;&#37682;&#12391;&#12365;&#12427;&#12290; &#29305;&#21029;&#25201;&#12356;&#12434;&#21463;&#12369;&#12427;&#26399;&#38291;&#65306; MIU &#12497;&#12483;&#12465;&#12540;&#12472;&#26009;&#37329;&#65288; 5 &#19975;&#12489;&#12531;&#65289;&#12364;&#35211;&#12360;&#12414;&#12377;&#12364;&#12289;&#35506;&#37329;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#12364;&#32066;&#12431;&#12427;&#26178;&#12289;&#25173;&#12356;&#25147;&#12373;&#12428;&#12427; &#12290; MIU &#12497;&#12483;&#12465;&#12540;&#12472; &#12398;&#12523;&#12540;&#12523;&#12393;&#12358;&#12426;&#12420;&#12427;&#65288; &#30330;&#20449;&#12364;&#20572;&#27490;&#12373;&#12428;&#12390;&#12356;&#12427;&#12539;&#30330;&#20449;&#12392;&#21463;&#20449;&#12364;&#20572;&#27490;&#12373;&#12428;&#12390;&#12356;&#12427; SMS &#12434;&#21463;&#12369;&#12427; &#35506;&#37329;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#12399; 31 &#26085;&#38291;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#12384;&#12387;&#12383;&#12425;&#12289;&#35506;&#37329;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#20197;&#20869;&#12395; 2MIU &#12364;&#12354;&#12387;&#12383;&#12425;&#12289; 2 &#12497;&#12483;&#12465;&#12540;&#12472;&#12434;&#21463;&#12369;&#12427;&#12290; N &#35506;&#37329;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#12395;&#12289;&#29305;&#21029;&#25201;&#12356;&#12434;&#21463;&#12369;&#20184;&#12369;&#12390;&#12356;&#12427;&#26178;&#12289; MI &#12497;&#12483;&#12465;&#12540;&#12472;&#12434;&#30331;&#37682;&#12377;&#12427;&#12392;&#12289;&#25552;&#20379;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12434;&#12461;&#12515;&#12531;&#12475;&#12523;&#12373;&#12428;&#12427;&#12290; N &#65291; 1 &#35506;&#37329;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#12398;&#29305;&#21029;&#25201;&#12356;&#12434;&#21463;&#12369;&#12427;&#12383;&#12417;&#12395;&#12289; MI &#12434;&#12461;&#12515;&#12531;&#12475;&#12523;&#12375;&#12394;&#12369;&#12428;&#12400;&#12394;&#12425;&#12394;&#12356;&#12290;&#12381;&#12398;&#19978;&#12289; N+1 &#35506;&#37329;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#12395; MIU &#12497;&#12483;&#12465;&#12540;&#12472;&#12434;&#30331;&#37682;&#12375;&#12394;&#12369;&#12428;&#12400;&#12394;&#12425;&#12394;&#12356; MIU &#12434;&#12461;&#12515;&#12531;&#12475;&#12523;&#12373;&#12428;&#12427;&#22580;&#21512;&#65288;&#26032;&#12375;&#12356; MI &#30330;&#30528;&#20449;&#20572;&#27490;&#12373;&#12428;&#12390;&#65289; &#44032;&#51077;&#48708; 49.000 &#46041; &#46608;&#45716; &#48512;&#44032;&#49464;&#47484; &#54252;&#54632;&#54620;&#45796; . &#54788;&#54665; &#48152;&#50732;&#47548;&#54620; &#44508;&#52825;&#50640; GM 9000 &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#52395; 2 &#51452;&#44592;&#50640;&#47564; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . 2.3. &#45936;&#51060;&#53552;&#50640; &#45824;&#54620; &#51452;&#51032; : &#51088;&#46041; &#49888;&#52397;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; ( &#44256;&#44061;&#51008; &#51088;&#44592;&#47196; &#49888;&#52397;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060; &#54596;&#50836;&#50630;&#45796; &#48512;&#45812;&#54644;&#50556; &#54632; ). &#45796;&#51020; &#51452;&#44592;&#50640;&#48512;&#53552; ( &#51452;&#44592; N+1) &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; &#48155;&#44592; &#50948;&#54644; &#44536; &#51064;&#53552;&#45367; &#54056;&#53431;&#51012; &#52712;&#49548;&#54616;&#44256; MIU &#54056;&#53431;&#51012; &#45796;&#49884; &#46321;&#47197;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . MIU &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#54644;&#52404;&#46112; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; ( &#49352;&#47196;&#50868; MIU &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49888;&#52397; , &#49688;&#49888; &#48143; &#48156;&#49888; &#48520;&#44032;&#45733;&#54624; &#49345;&#53468; &#46321; ) &#45796;&#51020; &#51452;&#44592;&#50640;&#48512;&#53552; ( &#51452;&#44592; N+1) &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; &#48155;&#44592; &#50948;&#54644; MIU &#54056;&#53431;&#51012; &#45796;&#49884; &#46321;&#47197;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . 2.4. &#54812;&#53469;&#52712;&#49548;&#50640; &#45824;&#54620; &#44508;&#51221; : &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44228;&#49549; &#44032;&#51077;&#54616;&#44256; &#49910;&#51648; &#50506;&#51012; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; HUY_DN &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648;&#47484; &#51089;&#49457;&#54616;&#50668; 999 &#48264;&#51004;&#47196; &#48372;&#45236;&#44256; &#54869;&#51064;&#54624; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; Y &#51089;&#49457;&#54644;&#49436; 999 &#48264;&#51004;&#47196; &#48372;&#45236;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . (200 &#46041; / &#44148; ) &#52712;&#49548;&#47484; &#49457;&#44277;&#51201;&#51004;&#47196; &#49888;&#52397;&#54624; &#46412;&#48512;&#53552; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#50630;&#45796; &#44032;&#51077;&#51012; &#52712;&#49548;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864; : &#49440; / &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47196; &#51204;&#54872; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49325;&#51228; &#44228;&#50557;&#51088; &#48320;&#44221; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#44144;&#51208; / &#52712;&#49548; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#52712;&#49548;&#54624; &#46412;&#45716; &#48708;&#50857;&#51060; &#49892;&#51228; &#49324;&#50857;&#54620; &#51068;&#49688; &#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#48512;&#44284;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . &#52712;&#49548;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#51116;&#44032;&#51077; &#48520;&#44032;&#45733;&#54620;&#45796; . 3. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#44592;&#44036; : 2013 &#45380; 10 &#50900; 01 &#51068; &#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 10 &#50900; 31 &#51068; &#44620;&#51648; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;&#6035;&#6085;&#6017;&#6082; 10/2013 (&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6040;&#6016;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;) 1. &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; 1 &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; 5 &#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6102; DN45, DN70, DN145, DN170, GM9000 &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 31/10/2014 &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6102; 1.500 &#6035;&#6070;&#6033;&#6072;/ &#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;&#6100; - MobiFone. - &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6043;&#6078;&#6031;&#6075; VNPT (&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;
